mapper.select: select oid,committime,amount,uid from orders where uid=#{0};

SELECT * FROM orders o,USER u,orderlist l WHERE o.uid=u.uid AND l.oid=o.oid and
and o.oid like concat('%',#{0},'%')
and u.name like concat('%',#{1},'%') or u.username like concat('%',#{1},'%')
and u.idCard like concat('%',#{2},'%')
limit #{3},#{4}

SELECT count(o.uid) FROM orders o,USER u,orderlist l WHERE o.uid=u.uid AND l.oid=o.oid and
and o.oid like concat('%',#{0},'%')
and u.name like concat('%',#{1},'%') or u.username like concat('%',#{1},'%')
and u.idCard like concat('%',#{2},'%')
